name: Lucia Crown
description: The Lucia Day celebration in Sweden includes lots of candles, songs and girls dressing up as the saint Lucia and her attendants. They wear long white gowns and each attendant carry a candle in her hand while Lucia wears a crown of burning candles.
languages: Additional languages which are not in the download: Swedish
full_text: The Lucia Day celebration in Sweden includes lots of candles, songs and girls dressing up as the saint Lucia and her attendants. They wear long white gowns and each attendant carry a candle in her hand while Lucia wears a crown of burning candles. This is a toddler-safe version.
